Alternate Systems is a respected & skilled technical service firm specializing in measurement assurance & research. Our world class calibration standards are relied upon by a wide variety of industries including: aerospace, defense, electronics, oil, surface finishing, food, medical, pharmaceutical as well as government agencies & national laboratories.

We utilize advanced manufacturing techniques & apply innovation & analytical talents to production processes for a diverse range of products. If you are driven to produce the best possible product & if it has to be right, call Alternate Systems today! Alternate Systems is a registered ISO 9001:2008 & ISO/IEC 17025:2005 firm, QASI Certificate A3205US.

We offer our customers: Calibration Coating Thickness Standards Coating Thickness Measurement Cold Chain Management SII Nanotechnology X-Ray Machines System Metrics X-Ray Fluorescence (XRF) Analysis & Measurement X-Ray Fluorescence (XRF) Coating Thickness Standards X-Ray Radiation Safety Training & Certification Laser Safety Training & Certification

All of our world class services and standards are NIST traceable in accordance with ANSI/NCSL Z540.3 ISO 10012, ISO 9001:2008 & ISO/IEC 17025:2005.
